Software Development Engineer (SDE).description: Software Development Engineer: Full-stack development, system design, algorithms, data structures, Java/Python/C++, microservices, API development.

Full-Stack Developer.description: Full-Stack Developer: Frontend and backend development, React/Angular, Node.js, databases, REST APIs, cloud deployment.

Backend Developer.description: Backend Developer: Server-side development, Java/Python, Spring Boot, REST APIs, microservices, Docker, Kubernetes, SQL.

Frontend Developer.description: Frontend Developer: User interface development, React/Vue/Angular, JavaScript, TypeScript, responsive design, CSS frameworks.

Mobile App Developer.description: Mobile App Developer: iOS/Android development, React Native, Flutter, Swift, Kotlin, mobile UI/UX, app store deployment.

DevOps Engineer.description: DevOps Engineer: CI/CD pipelines, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS/Azure/GCP, Infrastructure as Code, monitoring, automation.

Cloud Engineer.description: Cloud Engineer: Cloud infrastructure, AWS/Azure/GCP services, serverless, containers, cloud security, cost optimization.

Cloud Architect.description: Cloud Architect: Enterprise cloud strategy, multi-cloud solutions, scalability, security, compliance, cloud migration.

Site Reliability Engineer (SRE).description: Site Reliability Engineer: System reliability, monitoring, incident response, automation, performance optimization, scalability.

Infrastructure Engineer.description: Infrastructure Engineer: Server management, network configuration, virtualization, storage systems, backup solutions.

Security Analyst.description: Security Analyst: Threat detection, vulnerability assessment, security monitoring, incident analysis, compliance auditing.

Security Engineer.description: Security Engineer: Security architecture, penetration testing, security tools implementation, vulnerability management.

Penetration Tester (Ethical Hacker).description: Penetration Tester: Ethical hacking, vulnerability assessment, security testing, exploit development, security reporting.

Security Architect.description: Security Architect: Enterprise security design, security frameworks, risk management, compliance strategies.

Incident Response Specialist.description: Incident Response Specialist: Cybersecurity incident handling, forensics, malware analysis, breach investigation.

UI Designer.description: UI Designer: User interface design, visual design, design systems, prototyping, Figma/Sketch, responsive design.

UX Designer.description: UX Designer: User experience design, user research, wireframing, usability testing, journey mapping, information architecture.

Product Designer.description: Product Designer: End-to-end product design, user research, prototyping, design strategy, cross-functional collaboration.

Interaction Designer.description: Interaction Designer: Interactive design, micro-interactions, animation, user flows, behavior design, prototyping.

UX Researcher.description: UX Researcher: User research methodologies, data analysis, usability studies, A/B testing, research strategy.

Machine Learning Engineer.description: Machine Learning Engineer: ML model development, Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch, data pipelines, model deployment, MLOps.

Deep Learning Engineer.description: Deep Learning Engineer: Neural networks, deep learning frameworks, computer vision, NLP, model optimization, GPU computing.

NLP Engineer.description: NLP Engineer: Natural language processing, text analytics, language models, speech recognition, sentiment analysis.

Computer Vision Engineer.description: Computer Vision Engineer: Image processing, object detection, image classification, OpenCV, deep learning for vision.

AI Research Scientist.description: AI Research Scientist: AI research, algorithm development, academic publications, experimental design, cutting-edge AI.

Data Engineer.description: Data Engineer: Data pipelines, ETL processes, big data technologies, Spark, Hadoop, data warehousing, cloud platforms.

Data Analyst.description: Data Analyst: Data analysis, SQL, Excel, Python/R, data visualization, statistical analysis, business intelligence.

Business Intelligence (BI) Analyst.description: BI Analyst: Business intelligence, data modeling, reporting, dashboard creation, KPI analysis, data-driven insights.

Database Administrator.description: Database Administrator: Database management, performance tuning, backup and recovery, security, SQL optimization.

Big Data Engineer.description: Big Data Engineer: Big data technologies, Hadoop ecosystem, Spark, data lakes, distributed computing, real-time processing.

Digital Marketing Specialist.description: Digital Marketing Specialist: Digital marketing strategies, campaign management, analytics, conversion optimization.

SEO Specialist.description: SEO Specialist: Search engine optimization, keyword research, content optimization, technical SEO, link building.

Social Media Manager.description: Social Media Manager: Social media strategy, content creation, community management, social media advertising.

Content Marketing Manager.description: Content Marketing Manager: Content strategy, content creation, editorial planning, brand storytelling, content distribution.

Marketing Analytics Specialist.description: Marketing Analytics Specialist: Marketing data analysis, campaign performance, attribution modeling, ROI analysis.

Product Manager.description: Product Manager: Product strategy, roadmap planning, stakeholder management, market research, product launch.

Technical Product Manager.description: Technical Product Manager: Technical product strategy, engineering collaboration, API strategy, technical roadmap.

Product Owner.description: Product Owner: Agile product ownership, backlog management, user story writing, sprint planning, stakeholder communication.

Growth Product Manager.description: Growth Product Manager: Growth strategy, experimentation, user acquisition, retention, data-driven growth.

Product Marketing Manager.description: Product Marketing Manager: Go-to-market strategy, product positioning, competitive analysis, marketing campaigns.
